abstract: South Carolina firefighters try to put out fire at Mount Zion African Methodist Episcopal Church in Williamsburg County; officials say it is not clear what started fire at prominent black church.
lead_paragraph: Firefighters were trying to extinguish a blaze Tuesday night at Mount Zion African Methodist Episcopal Church, a prominent black church in Williamsburg County.
snippet: Firefighters were trying to extinguish a blaze Tuesday night at Mount Zion African Methodist Episcopal Church, a prominent black church in Williamsburg County.
